author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 83 persons who were trained at the Manithaneyam IAS coaching centre have cleared the UPSC civic services examinations (main), the results of which were released on Friday.

In a press release, the centre said successful candidates, who had not undergone coaching at the centre for the main examination, could also apply for the sessions that will be held at the centre for the personality test.

Candidates are requested to visitwww.saidais.com. A total of 28 women are among candidates who have qualified for the personality test, the release said.
title: 83 Manithaneyam candidates clear UPSC main exams
